reference_summary:
Nu-pore Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch - Blemish Patches to care for Blemish Control, scar prevention, must haves tools for skincare. korean makeup trusted cosmetics secret k-beauty. 60 Patches
nu-pore
{'Brand': 'Nu-pore', 'Item Form': 'Patch', 'Product Benefits': 'Blemish Control', 'Scent': 'Hydrocolloid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 1.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '780707702413'}
I tend to breakout a lot especially week prior to menstrual period. These pimple patches do a great job in minimizing pimple size and inflammation. I put it on at night before bed and when I wake up in the morning, the pimple is almost gone. It has good adhesion, mine did not come off during sleep. I definitely recommend.
Helps minimize inflammation
Eggplant Clearing Cleansing Oil Pad 60 pads, Makeup remover pad. Exfoliating. Simple easy quick wipe. Moisturizing cleansing oil pad
PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN
{'Brand': 'PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 3.82 x 2.72 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
Love these cleansing pads. I typically use fragrance free body oil to remove eye makeup, but was happy to see same thing in a pad. I was worried it would irritate the eyes, but it didn't! I used one pad for both eyes to remove waterproof mascara and eyeliner. No irritation and it took everything off! Definitely recommend!
Removes stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara!
Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz
Gryph & IvyRose
{'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'}
This is my third purchase from this brand! I got their shampoo/body wash and conditioner. Their products are amazing and I love the natural ingredients! Lotion is very hydrating for kids skin and has a nice scent. Quick absorbing and leaves skin feeling very soft and smooth. Definitely recommend!
Great natural lotion for kids

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

**Skincare Preferences:** The user maintains a strong focus on managing acne and blemish control while also emphasizing hydration for sensitive skin. Their recent purchases reflect an increasing affinity for natural, gentle products that stress hydration and quick absorption without irritation.

**Treatment Methods:** The user continues to favor topical solutions, particularly convenient options like cleansing pads, while also exploring hydrating lotions that provide effective moisture without adding complexity to their skincare routine.

**Product Characteristics:** The user values good adhesion, usability, and natural ingredients in skincare products, pairing gentle cleansing methods with nourishing lotions that are non-irritating. This consideration extends to products suitable for family use.

**Purchase Behavior:** The user leans towards K-beauty but has expanded their interest to brands that prioritize all-natural and cruelty-free formulations. Their recent purchases also show an appreciation for quality accessories, valuing aesthetics and functionality, as reflected in their selection of hair care items.

**Overall Trends:** The user pursues a holistic approach to skincare focused on acne management while diversifying with multi-functional hydration products. They prioritize efficiency, convenience, and product reliability, indicating a commitment to quality across both skincare and related lifestyle accessories that align with their needs and those of their family.
